verses.verse: A Song of Ascents; of Solomon. Except Jehova <WH3068> build <WH1129> the house <WH1004>, They labor <WH5998> in vain <WH7723> that build <WH1129> it <WH3068>: Except Jehovah keep <WH8104> the city <WH5892>, The watchman <WH8104> waketh <WH8245> but in vain <WH7723>.

It is vain <WH7723> for you to rise up <WH6965> early <WH7925>, To take rest <WH3427> late <WH309>, To eat <WH398> the bread <WH3899> of toil <WH6089>; For so he giveth <WH5414> unto his beloved <WH3039> sleep <WH8142>.
Lo <WH1121>, children are a heritage <WH5159> of Jehovah <WH3068>; And the fruit <WH6529> of the womb <WH990> is his reward <WH7939>.
As arrows <WH2671> in the hand <WH3027> of a mighty man <WH1368>, So are the children <WH1121> of youth <WH5271>.
Happy <WH835> is the man <WH1397> that hath his quiver <WH827> full <WH4390> of them <WH954>: They shall not be put to shame, When they speak <WH1696> with their enemies <WH341> in the gate <WH8179>.
